events.name: Boost Location Hackathon feat. Walkbase
events.about:
Do you feel like it’s time to put your hacking/design chops to the test? Do you enjoy pizza, kebab, late night hacking and gratuitous amounts of Red Bull?

Do you want to join in on a friendly competition with great prizes like iPad Minis and Raspberry Pis? 

Then join Walkbase and Boost Turku on the 8th of February at the Boost Farm for the first big Boost Hackathon of 2013!

Schedule: 

Friday

17:00 Open sign-in (all participants/teams must sign in)

18:00 Opening statements

18:10 Event description, practicalities, competition guidelines 

18:30 Introduction to Walkbase Analytics

●Android positioning library (Björn)

●iOS positioning library (Niclas)

19:00 Start hacking!

21:00 Dinner

 

Saturday

11:30 Lunch 

12:00 Pitch 101

12:30 The Hacking continues

15:00 Mid-hackathon status check by teams

20:00 Dinner

 

Sunday

11.30 Lunch

14:00 Demo time

16:00 Prizes are awarded by the Grand Jury of Destiny

 

The main sponsor of the event is VARMO - Varsinais-Suomen mobiililiiketoiminnan kehittämishanke. VARMO is partially funded by the European Social Fund.


Boost Location hackathon is also sponsored by: 

Red Bull - Keeping the teams hacking through the night.

TEK - Tekniikan akateemisten liitto

TFiF - Tekniska Föreningen i Finland
